original_text: So you must be careful. Be sure that you really have light in you. Be sure that you are not still in the dark.
korean_text: 그러므로 네 속에 있는 빛이 어둡지 아니한가 보라

sentences.original_text: Be sure that you really have light in you
sentences.korean_translation: 너 안에 정말 빛이 있는지 확실히 하라

sentences.original_text: Be sure that you are not still in the dark
sentences.korean_translation: 너가 아직 어둠 속에 있지 않은지 확실히 하라
